typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{SystemID = SYS30358|DeviceID = 14124D82CA|SoftwareVer = 3.0.0.14|Timezone = (GMT-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada)|} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'srcfile',
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['/*_InternalGpsData.log']) ~> sourceGPS
